article:
Dear Lin Tao,
How are you? I'm at home in New York. You ask me some questions in your letter. Let me answer  _ .
America is beautiful. We like the school and the people here are very friendly. My sister and I  _  to the same  school. We have _ from Monday to Friday. _ we go to English classes every Saturday. On Sunday, my father _ us to the parks.
My father works in a big factory and my mother works in a hospital. They work very hard. I have many friends in my school. They often ask me something _ China. They like playing basketball. I often play with them. I don't like American food at all.
Do you _ English every day? How are the other friends? Please _ in English in your letter next time.
